mapper.select: SELECT qp.que_id que_id,qt.`name` que_type,q.score que_score,aa.content answers FROM question_paper qp, question q,question_type qt, alternative_answer aa WHERE qp.pap_id = #{id} AND qp.que_id = q.que_id AND q.que_typ_id = qt.que_typ_id AND q.que_id = aa.que_id AND aa.`right` = #{rightFlag} GROUP BY qp.que_id

SELECT rd.que_res questionResult, rd.paperId paperId,rd.testId testId,rd.studentId studentId FROM result_detail rd WHERE rd.paperId = #{paperid} AND rd.studentId = #{studentid} AND rd.testId = #{testid}
